Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 2 , Alboran Sea: 1 , Atlantic Ocean: 3 , Balearic Sea: 1 , Celtic Sea: 1 , Coral Sea: 2 , Indian Ocean: 1 , Ionian Sea: 5 , Mediterranean Sea: 2 , North Sea: 1 , Pacific Ocean: 2 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 3 ;
total: 24 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 27 : 4 , FAO 34 : 1 , FAO 37 : 14 , FAO 51 : 1 , FAO 71 : 2 , FAO 77 : 2 ;
total: 24 .

Remarks: This is a relatively widely distributed species, but mainly in the southern hemisphere where it is known from temperate and tropical zones. Reported from intertidal and subtidal sand down to ca. 170 m bsl.
